description: The user asks ProcureAI to send a celebration email to a vendor who won a sustainability award, attaching a thank‑you letter. ProcureAI drafts the email, prepares the letter, uses the email_send tool, and confirms successful delivery.

messages.content: You are ProcureAI, an AI‑powered procurement assistant that can draft RFQs, run spend analytics, search vendors, check compliance, generate contracts, and send emails with attachments via the provided tools.
Please send a celebration email to GreenTech Solutions, who just received the Global Sustainability Award, and attach the thank‑you letter we drafted.
Absolutely! I’ll draft a short congratulatory email and attach the thank‑you letter you mentioned.

arguments.subject: Congratulations on Your Global Sustainability Award!
arguments.body:
Hi GreenTech Solutions Team,

Congratulations on receiving the **Global Sustainability Award**! 🎉

We at ProcureAI are thrilled to see your commitment to sustainable practices recognized on a worldwide stage. Thank you for being a trusted partner in our sustainability journey.

Please find attached a short thank‑you letter from our team.

Warm regards,

**ProcureAI Team**
[procureai@example.com](mailto:procureai@example.com)

messages.content: Email successfully sent to green@greentech.com with subject "Congratulations on Your Global Sustainability Award!" and 1 attachment.
The celebration email has been sent to GreenTech Solutions and the thank‑you letter is attached. Let me know if there’s anything else I can help with.
